topics.author: 505696b47f123b37e800effa

topics.body:
I am actually half asleep right now so let me post this real quick before I forgot.

Woke up.
Had a dream.
Two dreams actually.
The first was a bike race between a normal mountain bike and a jet/turbine engine motorcycle of my own design. 
Took place in a storage place at a harbour.
The race was straight lined.
There were people watching on the stand.
I was one of them.
Dreamt through the view of a camera.
Some guy made a troll face.
I made an insane laugh pose, like a supervillain.
Became a meme.
Woke up laughing.

Second was asleep again.
Mystical dojo and future tech.
4 kung-fu apprentices find a secret elevator on roof of dojo after stalking master.
Leads 2 floors below before discovering a third floor.
Third floor is alternate dimension.
Low gravity and distorted, broken buildings with floating in purple space.
Discovered something. 
They are in threat of an attack after seeing future.
Call help.
Genius Japanese kid with robots from Astro Boy and a toy-like HulkBuster Suit came.
Placed mini robots to guard by electrocuting enemies, sensors that exploded in fireworks and mines in case of enemy presence , giant long-range cannon and blimp robots to guard sky zone. 
Bad guys come from sky with army of dark eldritch beings the size of horse.
One bad guy wore a black samurai armour with claws.
Another wore similar but bulkier and larger, also had cape.
I was the Japanese kid in the HulkBuster armor that looks like BayMax.
Fought the bulkier dude while kung-fu kids fought against the other guy.
Robots fights devil army. 
I was losing one-on-one battle due to slow moving.
Managed to get upper hand.
Throw bad guy into building.
Went to help kung-fu kids.
Fought the other dude.
Punched him in the balls.
Watched him squeal and laughed at his misery.
Punched him onto a bench which was indestructible. 
Dude's HP restored.
Magical bench that restores health through sassy-ness.
I thought it was ridiculous.
The bulkier bad guy came.
Knocked me out. 
Woke up (again).

Back to sleep.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
